channel.title: Anybody good with MySQL injection(I'm securing my site)
channel.description: I need a tester for the search engine on one of my projects that I could integrate with future projects, however I am trying to get it so that it is completely MySQL injection safe. Please Post or PM me to get in contact with me(I prefer MSN) thanks for those that know how to do it :rolleyes:

item.title: Anybody good with MySQL injection(I'm securing my site)
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

I wouldn’t say I’m ultra leet at sql injection, but I’ve done my research.

Read full topic
item.source: Anybody good with MySQL injection(I'm securing my site)

item.title: Anybody good with MySQL injection(I'm securing my site)
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

_ % can be used as a wild card
you can use unicode that has the binary code that is the same of multiple characters that can bypass it, and so forth
I just want someone that is good at it to try to beat mine.

Read full topic
item.source: Anybody good with MySQL injection(I'm securing my site)

item.title: Anybody good with MySQL injection(I'm securing my site)
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

mysql_real_escape_string(trim($string))

lol? Tell me how to bypass that =S
